dangerousGoods.emergencyProcedures: Refer to the Safety Data Sheet (SDS) for specific emergency procedures. In case of spills, leaks or fires, contact emergency services immediately and provide them with the SDS.
dangerousGoods.specialHandlingInstructions: DOOR DELIVERY REQUIRED. Handle with care. Avoid contact with skin, eyes and clothing. Do not eat, drink or smoke when handling this material. Ensure adequate ventilation. Use appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE) such as gloves, safety glasses and a respirator.
dangerousGoods.regulatoryInformation: Comply with all applicable regulations for the transportation of hazardous materials, including the International Maritime Dangerous Goods (IMDG) Code, IATA Dangerous Goods Regulations, and local regulations.
